p: To assess either modelsâ€™ fitness and robustness, their lack of chance correlation was checked by Y-scrambling procedure whose 100 runs of cross-validated scrambled set led to average, standard deviation, maximum and minimum values for Accuracy Y-S, MCC Y-S, Precision-Recall Y-S and ROC-AUC Y-S ROC-AUC coefficients always lower than non-cross-validated and cross-validated ones, therefore assessing validity of all final models.
